amendment.description: To increase the supply and lower the cost of petroleum by temporarily suspending the acquisition of petroleum for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4737 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 97 - 1. Record Vote Number: 124.

action.text: Amendment SA 4737 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Reid to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S4056, S4057-4059; text: CR S4056) To increase the supply and lower the cost of petroleum by temporarily suspending the acquisition of petroleum for the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4737 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Reid to Amendment SA 4707.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4737 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 97 - 1. Record Vote Number: 124.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4737 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 97 - 1. Record Vote Number: 124.
